text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
And that's the red and violet cellophane taken care of! 
We also managed to get some colored markers… 
I guess we're done shopping for today?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
That was one hell of a shopping spree. 
All our shopping bags are about to burst LMAO☆

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, they sure are. We really filled up on prop and costume supplies. 
We got acrylic paints, cardboard, chocolate bars…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh? C-Chocolate bars? When did we get snacks…?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Bwahaha! Took you look enough to notice!! 
…You're wide open!!
(Rustle Rustle!!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Uwah! Candies and chips are in my bag too! 
You really got me～…!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaha! And donuts in mine! Sheesh! 
Our Demon Queen savage out here!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Do you get it now? Never let your guard down! 
Now, contemplate that as you lament having to carry this all back.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…But, afterwards, you may share those 
snacks with everyone as a reward.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Pant pant… Oh Windy-chan-sama's pranking skills, 
how godly… how positively godly…! I am thankful I can witness this live…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Hm… Doto-san? Is something the matter? 
You seem to be deep in thought there.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's nothing… it's just… I was holding onto our project 
wallet this whole time, so…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
A prank is still a prank, but these snacks… 
probably came out of Windy's own wallet…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Koff

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Kyaa!? D-D-D-Digital-san!?!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Doto, you're walking way too slow! 
You're now fired from supply carrying duty. 
Too bad for you, these supplies now belong to Windy-chan!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Sheesh Demon Queen, you're so villainous today! Slay～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Mwahaha!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
But Windy-san, those bags are really heavy… 
uhm uhm, at least let me carry them with you～…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
NO! 
Catch me if you can～!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: W-Wait for me～…!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Runner battle!? Are we having a Runner battle!? 
I won't lose—!! Ahahaha!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …Man, they sure are having fun.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ehehehe, they sure are… ehehehehe…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, you're having extra fun yourself too! 
…Yup, I love this sort of thing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Events like All Hooves' Day are a chance for 
people who rarely get together to make something 
amazing happen! Yup, this is the best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Digital, I'm so glad we were able to become friends, I've been 
having so much fun! I'd like to thank you and Doto for inviting 
the two of us to this project.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
HOHYA!? F-F-F-F-F-Friend!? Nono, I have not leveled up enough 
to be deserving of such an honorable title!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
B-But, uhm, uhm… uh. 
I-I am happy to hear you say that… yes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, come on, that's not something to sound so thankful for!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…but seriously, thank you, really. 
You see– I was in a frantic mess before you invited us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I kept thinking "I need to do well in the Autumn races" 
and pointlessly intensified my own training. 
Naturally that just wore out my body…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Eh? I had no idea!? I'm really sorry. 
You're so busy, yet here we were inviting you to something like this…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
You got it all wrong! Thanks to your invite and Helios's pushing, 
I was able to get away from racing for a bit, 
and now I'm completely refreshed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
So… as we continued to prepare for All Hooves' Day, 
I watched how everyone was… and I got me thinking again…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: –that maybe I should be a bit selfish too.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Palmer-san…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
That's why—Windy! And everyone else too. 
I've got something I want you all to hear.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Starting next week… 
Helios and I will start training more for our Autumn races.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
So… I'm sorry, but I think we won't be able to help out with the 
project as much as before.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I know we said we'd help, so I'm really sorry! 
But, for us, this is something we really wanna do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yup. The two of us want to make waves. We'll start the Autumn 
Race season by leaving everyone in the dust.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I was praised by our unyielding Demon Queen herself, 
after all. That's why, I'm not just thinking of 
doing my best anymore. I want to win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
"I have to win", "I have to give it my all" is all 
I could think about. If it's with my bestie, then 
I gotta run the best possible run I can, right?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Fine then.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
I don't care. Do what you want! Demon Queen Windy-chan's army is 
a lot bigger now. Two people leaving is not that big a deal!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
But don't forget! You two are number 3 and 4 
of Windy-chan's Four Heavenly Lords!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
If you run a boring race, I'll ne～～ver forgive you! 
As subjects of an evil queen, I won't accept anything but a perfect victory!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Windy…!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Aha, o―――f course!! 
Leave it to us, Demon Queen☆

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I see, so it's gonna get a bit more lonely from now on… 
but we should still cheer those two on.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: …Huh? Digital-san…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(…At the time, I somehow failed to hear Doto-san's words, 
but even then, I couldn't help thinking about it.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(When summer ends, autumn begins. 
We're even excited for this year's races, so that much should be obvious…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(But it was only when the cold wind blew on my cheek that 
I finally remembered that fact. At the time, I thought to myself…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ("Things are going to get lonelier-")
